stories.headline: I-35 expansion to demolish apartments
stories.description: A UT student lived in an affordable-housing apartment complex set to be demolished by the I-35 expansion, which also caused the demolition of dozens of businesses.

stories.headline: Historic building to face demolition
stories.description: A new UT football training facility would demolish the School of Social Work, which once housed University Junior High, the first intergrated middle school in Austin.

stories.headline: University investigates protestors
stories.description: Two teaching assistants who were relieved of their positions for speaking in support of Palestine. The university investigated a group of students who protested the decision.
